long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The sidebar seemed to be distracting when reading prompts. Here is an extension to help you remove that and focus 100% on the content. Hides the following:
- Sidebar
- Header
- Like & comment buttons
- Existing comments 

Usage Guide: Click to enable or disable focus mode. Shortcut 'Cmd/Ctrl + B'.
